testcase.name: Practise formları doldurma
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "https://testpages.herokuapp.com/styled/basic-html-form-test.html" sayfasindadır.passed And username "kullanici adi" password "sifre" ve textarea "metin alani" kisimlarini doldurur.passed And bir dosya yukler........................................................passed And checkbox1 i secer.......................................................passed And radio2 yi secer.........................................................passed And selection item3 secer...................................................passed And dropdown itmem4 secer...................................................passed And submite tiklar..........................................................passed Then dosyanin yuklendigini dogrular.........................................passed
